Description: Blue glazed composition reis shabti of Hor(em)akhbit with painted detail: a lappet-wig with black striations and a fillet, a cursorily modelled face with black eyes, one arm hangs down the side, the other arm is held across the waist and holds a black whip, the figure is represented wearing a garment with elbow-length sleeves and a triangular apron inscribed with painted black Hieroglyphs, the feet are separated and the toes are marked.
